title: Maker (MKR) Price Rallies Amid Massive $156M Burn, What‚Äôs Next?
body: Maker (MKR) price has defied the broader crypto market‚Äôs recent turbulent action, rallying over 75% in a week. The DeFi cryptocurrency recently witnessed a staggering $156 million token burn, which appears to have fueled a price upswing. As a result, market watchers are highly bullish on the token‚Äôs future outlook, although a recent smart whale trade maneuver sparked contrasting speculations. Maker (MKR) Price Bullish As Supply Takes Hit Amid Massive $156M Burn According to a series of X posts by the transaction tracker Whale Alert on Feb 20, a staggering $156.77 million MKR was burnt recently, which dealt a massive blow to the token‚Äôs circulating supply. As an upshot, Maker price soared 77%, per the weekly chart, abiding by the law of supply and demand. For context, token burn mechanisms focus on permanently reducing a crypto‚Äôs market supply, propelling a bullish impact on price. Meanwhile, the wallet address ‚Äò0xf65‚Äô was reported to be solely responsible for the massive burn, per Whale Alert data that revealed 8 colossal burn transactions on Feb 20. Market watchers weigh substantial optimism over the asset in light of the supply shredding drastically within such a brief period. TVL Boosts Market Standing Simultaneously, another vital factor appears to be driving the leading DeFi token ‚Äòs recent growth. As per DeFiLlama data, the TVL on the Maker ecosystem stood at $5.55 billion on Friday. This data further cemented the protocol‚Äôs market standing, making it one of the top DeFi projects on the Ethereum blockchain. Source: DeFiLlama MKR Price Rally To Sustain? As mentioned above, MKR coin‚Äôs price has already defied the broader market turmoil, rallying 77% in a week and over 22% in a day. The coin currently rests at $1,445.25, with an intraday low and high of $1,177.44 and $1473.35, respectively. Traders also appear to be positive amid the massive burn, as the coin‚Äôs intraday trading volume soared 166% to $257.95 million. Smart Whale‚Äôs Trading Sparks Caution However, it‚Äôs worth mentioning that a smart whale has cashed out all its MKR holdings amid the recent rally. Although this mover underscored a profit-booking motive, market watchers exercise caution as the selloff also indicates a loss of confidence for the asset among experienced traders. According to SpotonChain data on Feb 21, the address 0x637 (‚Äúinveteratus.eth‚Äù) sold all his holdings (1,230 MKR) for 1.78 million USDC at an average price of $1,448. This trader boasts a 100% win rate with his previous tradings for the same DeFi token. In turn, the maneuver added a layer of intrigue to the price action ahead despite massive burn transactions spurring a rally. The post Maker (MKR) Price Rallies Amid Massive $156M Burn, What‚Äôs Next? appeared first on CoinGape .

title: Explosive Growth Ahead? Gaming Giants Eye Crypto Tokens, Reveals Immutable Co-founder
body: Are you ready for the next level of gaming and cryptocurrency convergence? Imagine your favorite gaming universes powered by digital assets, offering unprecedented player ownership and engagement. Well, the future might be closer than you think! Exciting news is buzzing in the crypto sphere as Robbie Ferguson, the co-founder of Immutable, a prominent Ethereum layer-2 scaling solution, dropped a bombshell on X (formerly Twitter). He revealed that numerous gaming behemoths, each boasting a market capitalization exceeding a staggering $1 billion, are seriously contemplating launching their own crypto tokens. This revelation signals a potential paradigm shift in the gaming industry, potentially intertwining it deeply with the world of blockchain and digital assets. Let‚Äôs dive into what this could mean for gamers, crypto enthusiasts, and the future of interactive entertainment. Why Are Gaming Giants Suddenly Interested in Gaming Tokens? The announcement by Robbie Ferguson has sent ripples of excitement and speculation throughout the crypto and gaming communities. But what‚Äôs driving this sudden surge of interest in gaming tokens from these industry titans? Several factors could be at play, pushing these companies towards exploring the realm of digital assets: Enhanced Player Engagement and Ownership: Crypto tokens can revolutionize player engagement by offering true ownership of in-game assets. Unlike traditional gaming models where virtual items are controlled by game developers, blockchain gaming tokens empower players to own, trade, and utilize their assets across different platforms, fostering a more invested and loyal player base. New Revenue Streams and Economic Models: Gaming tokens open up entirely new revenue streams for gaming companies beyond traditional game sales and in-app purchases. They can facilitate play-to-earn models, decentralized marketplaces, and innovative in-game economies, potentially unlocking billions in new value. Community Building and Decentralization: Issuing crypto gaming tokens can strengthen community bonds by giving players a stake in the game‚Äôs ecosystem. Tokens can be used for governance, allowing players to participate in decision-making processes and shape the game‚Äôs future, fostering a sense of ownership and shared purpose. Attracting the Web3 Audience: The growing web3 gaming community is actively seeking immersive and rewarding experiences powered by blockchain technology. By embracing crypto tokens, traditional gaming companies can tap into this burgeoning market and attract a new generation of gamers who value decentralization and digital ownership. Unlocking New Dimensions: The Benefits of Crypto Gaming Tokens The potential benefits of integrating crypto gaming tokens into billion-dollar gaming companies are vast and transformative. Let‚Äôs explore some key advantages: Revolutionizing In-Game Economies: Gaming tokens can power dynamic and player-driven in-game economies. Imagine a world where players can earn tokens by participating in quests, winning tournaments, or contributing to the game‚Äôs ecosystem, and then use these tokens to purchase items, customize their characters, or even cash them out. This creates a more engaging and rewarding gameplay loop. Cross-Game Interoperability: Blockchain gaming technology allows for the potential of interoperability between different games. Your hard-earned assets in one game could potentially be usable or tradable in another game within the same ecosystem or even across different gaming platforms, maximizing the value and utility of player assets. Enhanced Security and Transparency: Crypto gaming tokens leverage the security and transparency of blockchain technology. Transactions are recorded on a public ledger, ensuring fairness and preventing fraud within the game‚Äôs economy. This transparency builds trust and confidence among players. Global Reach and Accessibility: Web3 gaming tokens can facilitate global reach and accessibility for gaming companies. Crypto transactions are borderless, allowing companies to tap into international markets and reach players who may not have access to traditional payment systems. Navigating the Challenges: Roadblocks in Blockchain Gaming Token Adoption While the prospect of major gaming companies embracing gaming tokens is incredibly exciting, it‚Äôs crucial to acknowledge the challenges and potential roadblocks that lie ahead: Regulatory Uncertainty: The regulatory landscape surrounding cryptocurrencies and digital assets is still evolving globally. Gaming companies need to navigate complex and often unclear regulations regarding token issuance, distribution, and trading. Compliance will be paramount for widespread adoption. User Adoption and Education: Educating mainstream gamers about the benefits and functionalities of crypto gaming tokens is crucial. Many traditional gamers may be unfamiliar with blockchain technology and digital wallets. User-friendly interfaces and clear communication will be essential for driving adoption. Scalability and Transaction Costs: For blockchain gaming to handle the massive scale of popular online games, scalability solutions are essential. High transaction fees and slow processing times on some blockchains could hinder the user experience. Layer-2 solutions like Immutable X are designed to address these scalability challenges. Market Volatility and Risk Management: The cryptocurrency market is known for its volatility. Gaming companies and players need to be aware of the potential risks associated with holding and trading web3 gaming tokens, including price fluctuations and market downturns. Robust risk management strategies will be necessary. Web3 Gaming Tokens: Shaping the Future of Interactive Entertainment? The potential entry of billion-dollar gaming companies into the web3 gaming space through token issuance could be a watershed moment for the industry. It suggests a growing recognition of the transformative power of blockchain technology to revolutionize gaming experiences. Token issuance could be a strategic move that positions these companies at the forefront of innovation, attracting a new generation of players and unlocking unprecedented economic opportunities. Imagine a future where: Players truly own their in-game creations and achievements, carrying them across different virtual worlds. Gaming communities are more empowered and actively participate in shaping the games they love. New economic models reward players for their time and skill, blurring the lines between gaming and earning. Gaming becomes more immersive, interactive, and interconnected than ever before, fueled by the power of blockchain. Token Issuance: A Strategic Move for Gaming Companies? For these gaming giants, considering token issuance is not just about jumping on a bandwagon; it‚Äôs likely a strategic move driven by a long-term vision. They are potentially recognizing that the future of gaming is increasingly intertwined with decentralization, digital ownership, and community-driven experiences. By exploring token issuance , these companies are not just creating new revenue streams; they are potentially building the foundation for the next generation of gaming ecosystems. Robbie Ferguson‚Äôs revelation is more than just industry gossip; it‚Äôs a signal flare illuminating the path towards a more decentralized, player-centric, and economically vibrant gaming future. As these billion-dollar companies delve deeper into the world of crypto gaming tokens, we can expect to witness groundbreaking innovations that redefine how we play, interact, and engage with virtual worlds. The game is changing, and it‚Äôs about to get a whole lot more interesting. To learn more about the latest crypto gaming trends, explore our article on key developments shaping web3 gaming adoption.

title: Crypto Market Faces Weak Demand, Needs Trump Initiatives to Kick In, JPMorgan Says
body: The cryptocurrency market is lacking positive catalysts in the near term, Wall Street bank JPMorgan (JPM) said in a report Wednesday. The correction in crypto markets in recent months has seen both bitcoin ( BTC ) and ether ( ETH ) futures near backwardation, which is a sign of lower demand, the report said. Backwardation occurs when the spot price of an asset is higher than the price trading in the futures market. "This is a negative development and indicative of demand weakness by those institutional investors that use regulated CME futures contracts to gain exposure into these two cryptocurrencies," analysts led Nikolaos Panigirtzoglou wrote. If demand for bitcoin and ether futures is healthy, the futures cost more than the spot price, and the curve is said to be in contango , the bank noted. When demand slows and price expectations soften, the futures curve moves towards backwardation, the bank added. This weakness in demand could be due to a number of reasons. Positive crypto initiatives by Trump's new administration are more likely to kick in during the second half of the year, the bank said, and this means institutional investors are likely taking profits due to a lack of short-term catalysts. Lower demand from systematic and momentum-driven funds, such as CTAs, has also affected bitcoin and ether futures, JPMorgan added. Read more: U.S. Crypto Task Force to Focus on Delivering National Bitcoin Reserve: Bernstein

title: From Prison, SBF Claims FTX Had Funds, Blames ‚ÄòLiquidity Panic‚Äô
body: SBF denies FTX bankruptcy, calling it a liquidity crisis that hindered fund access. Bankman-Fried criticizes the legal system and political struggles affecting his trial. Despite financial loss, SBF focuses on effective altruism and supports global causes. Sam Bankman-Fried (SBF), the former head of the defunct-FTX exchange, has offered his take on the company‚Äôs downfall in a recent prison interview. SBF firmly denied that FTX went bankrupt, instead calling it a liquidity crisis. He argued that FTX possessed sufficient assets to repay all customers, but market panic, fueled by the liquidity issue, hindered their ability to quickly access the necessary funds. SBF said in a recent interview that FTX has never gone bankrupt. This was a liquidity crisis, not an insolvency problem. They had enough assets to repay all customers at the time. The problem is that the liquidity crisis caused market panic and made it impossible to quickly cash‚Ä¶ ‚Äî Wu Blockchain (@WuBlockchain) February 21, 2025 Bankman-Fried made it clear that FTX was never insolvent. He maintained that the company had enough assets to cover all customer holdings. He explained that the liq‚Ä¶ The post From Prison, SBF Claims FTX Had Funds, Blames ‚ÄòLiquidity Panic‚Äô appeared first on Coin Edition .

title: Bitunix Lists PAIN, the Sensational Meme Coin That Raised a Staggering $39.2M in Just 2 Days
body: Meme coins have undoubtedly always been an integral part of cryptocurrencies. They have often dominated the industry and continue to do so. Since the launch of Dogecoin in 2013 at the beginning of the industry, the meme coin race began. These assets are known for their high volatility and are considered speculative investments, but they are adored by the crypto community. According to a report from Coingecko , meme coins were the most popular narrative assets in 2024 with a dominance of 31%. The trend continues to be similar in 2025 as well with many meme coins popping left and right. One meme coin that has gained great popularity is PAIN a meme coin inspired by the well-known internet meme "Hide the Pain, Harold." Considering the popularity of this meme coin, the world's fastest-growing crypto exchange Bitunix listed it on its spot market on February 20th. What is Pain (PAIN) Meme Coin? Pain (PAIN) is a meme coin that represents the struggles and hardships people face in life, especially in the crypto world. It was created based on a series of stock photos of Andr√°s Istv√°n Arat√≥, a Hungarian retired electrical engineer who is known as a famous Hide the Pain Harold internet meme. Pain meme coin became big news when it raised $39.2 million in just two days in its presale. Pain meme coin was created as a fun way to turn losses and difficulties into something positive. Just like other meme coins, PAIN doesn‚Äôt have a serious utility or purpose, its main value comes from the community and the emotions it represents. A MESSAGE FROM HAROLD pic.twitter.com/KgpIj3oGms ‚Äî PAIN (@pain) February 20, 2025 The idea behind PAIN is that everyone in crypto has experienced financial losses, bad investments, or market crashes, so instead of feeling sad, PAIN lets people embrace these struggles and laugh about them. The coin has gained popularity because it connects with traders and investors who have felt the ups and downs of the market. PAIN is based on Solana and follows the same basic principles as other cryptocurrencies, but its main strength is its community. The more people relate to the concept, the more they support the coin. PAIN has become a symbol of resilience and humor in crypto space. In short, PAIN is not just a meme coin but it‚Äôs a way to turn difficult moments into a shared joke and bring people together through humor. Where to Buy Pain (PAIN) Meme Coin? Pain meme coin can be purchased on the world's fastest-growing crypto exchange , Bitunix. The latter listed PAIN on the spot market on February 20th. Bitunix is a crypto exchange that offers over 700 trading pairs and offers a slick interface. The exchange has also recently introduced a Convert Option so users can convert their assets more easily. title: ECB Develops Blockchain Payment System for CBDC, BTC Bull Token Captures Retail Interest
body: The difference between the US and EU approaches to crypto has become evident as the European Central Bank (ECB) is building a blockchain system to process CBDC (Central Bank Digital Currency) transactions. ECB President Christine Lagarde also nixed the idea of a European Bitcoin reserve due to $BTC‚Äôs volatility and frequent use in illicit activities (which isn‚Äôt entirely true‚Äì criminals prefer cash to crypto ). In contrast, President Trump and Fed Chair Jerome Powell are strictly against CBDCs , and 20 US states have proposed establishing crypto reserves (cries in European). Let‚Äôs unpack what the EU‚Äôs anti-crypto stance means for the market. Inside the ECB‚Äôs CBDC Plan The launch of an EU-wide blockchain payment system is the first step toward rolling out a fully functioning wholesale CBDC, the digital euro. This system will be compatible with TARGET Services, a platform that currently handles large-value payments, securities settlement, and instant payments across Europe. After integrating the new system with TARGET, the ECB will focus on its interoperability with foreign CBDC infrastructures for exchange settlements. ECB Board member Piero Cipollone deems this innovation, but European crypto investors would likely call it an attempt at surveillance. ECB Is Against Crypto Reserves, Czech Republic Feels Rebellious The ECB also disapproved of the Czech National Bank‚Äôs plan to allocate 5% of its reserves to $BTC purchases. CNB Governor Ale≈° Michl argued he used to run an investment fund and ‚Äòlikes profitability,‚Äô which suggests the Czech Republic might soon set a precedent for other EU countries. It‚Äôs clear that the EU prioritizes safety and stability over individual freedoms and technological development. However, this might change when multiple US states create crypto reserves, particularly if they prove this strategy to be fruitful. Non-eurozone countries like the Czech Republic would be the first to go against the tide, and others could follow suit. When this happens, $BTC will rally to new heights due to broader adoption and legitimacy. BTC Bull Token ($BTCBULL) Celebrates Crypto‚Äôs Historic Rally With $BTC Airdrops While government officials remain cautious, retail investors can go for riskier opportunities like new meme coins on presale that might yield greater returns. But not all new crypt o have an equal chance in this bull run. BTC Bull Token ($BTCBULL) is the only meme coin closely linked to $BTC. It supports the OG crypto on its way to $250K with regular $BTC airdrops. All you need to get free $BTC is to buy $BTCBULL, hold it in Best Wallet , and wait for the world‚Äôs first crypto to hit $150K and $200K. When $BTC reaches $250K, the project will reward its loyal holders with a massive $BTCBULL token airdrop. $BTCBULL‚Äôs deflationary tokenomics model aims to support the token‚Äôs upward price action after launch. Whenever $BTC hits $125K, $175K, and $225K, the project will permanently remove a part of the tokens for circulation to create scarcity and drive demand. $BTCBULL‚Äôs presale kicked off on February 11 and has since raised $2.5M. One token now costs $0.002375, but the price is increasing fast as the project progresses toward new fundraising milestones. This means now is the time to take the bull by the horns and secure your share of $BTCBULL before everyone else does. Early adopters also benefit from a 172% APY, set to decrease as the staking pool expands. Final Remarks We aren‚Äôt just watching a battle of regulations‚Äìwe‚Äôre watching two different philosophies play out in real time. While the US says, ‚Äòlet‚Äôs give crypto a shot,‚Äô the EU is giving it a cold shoulder. This doesn‚Äôt mean that the ECB is entirely against innovation, though. Its blockchain-based payment system could also support crypto like $BTC and altcoins in the future if the US and Czech Republic lead by example. Institutional adoption will fuel this year‚Äôs $BTC rally, and $BTCBULL has positioned itself to capture investor appetite. However, remember the old-school Wall Street saying: bulls make money, bears make money, pigs get slaughtered. Don‚Äôt get greedy‚ÄìDYOR, diversify your portfolio, and only invest as much as you can afford to lose.

title: Bitcoin Exchange Bithumb Announced That It Has Delisted These Two Altcoins! Here's Why
body: Bithumb, one of the leading cryptocurrency exchanges in South Korea, announced the delisting of Valor (VALOR) and Bitcoin Gold (BTG) as part of its investor protection policies. Bithumb to Delist Valor (VALOR) and Bitcoin Gold (BTG) Tokens The exchange noted that both assets failed to meet listing maintenance standards, leading to the termination of support for trading and withdrawals. Bithumb stated that the documentation provided by the Valor Foundation was insufficient to address concerns regarding the utility and disclosures of the token. After conducting a comprehensive review, the Exchange has determined that VALOR no longer meets the criteria for continued trading support. Bitcoin Gold (BTG) has been delisted following a decision by the Digital Asset eXchange Alliance (DAXA), a consortium of South Korean exchanges responsible for monitoring asset risks and investor protection. Bithumb announced that concerns regarding BTG‚Äôs sustainability and operational transparency led to its removal from the platform. Dates of Delist Transaction (Buy/Sell) Ends: March 24, 2025, 15:00 Withdrawal Support Ends: April 23, 2025, 15:00 Important Notes for Users All unfilled buy and sell orders will be automatically canceled after being removed from the list. API trading for both tokens will also be suspended. Users who wish to withdraw their tokens must register a whitelisted wallet address beforehand as the review process may take time. Holding delisted tokens beyond the withdrawal deadline may result in losses due to lack of technical support or potential price drops on other exchanges. Bithumb reminds users that investing in cryptocurrencies carries significant risks, including the possible loss of all or part of capital. *This is not investment advice. title: Golem ICO wallets start moving Ethereum (ETH) again
body: Golem, one of the high-profile token sales of 2016, is moving Ethereum (ETH) to Binance again. The project, which promised to build decentralized computing, was financed with 820,000 ETH. Golem, one of the best-funded crypto projects, moved Ethereum (ETH) again in several transactions to Binance and Coinbase. The Golem project, which promised to build decentralized computation tools, made its biggest earnings from simply gaining ETH upfront and using a part of it for staking. The Golem wallets became active in the past month, coinciding with the slide of ETH under $3,000. The ICO started moving funds earlier, though the latest transactions have the biggest potential to put pressure on ETH. The problem of old ICOs with big treasuries and dormant reserves of ETH is one of the big issues for the token‚Äôs price. Some wallets from the original ETH ICO now contain more tokens even compared to the Ethereum Foundation. The Golem ICO moved funds for the first time in five months. Previously, the Golem multisig wallet funded a series of new addresses, which are now the origin of transactions to exchanges. In the past week, Golem shifted 7,250 ETH to intermediary addresses, of which 4,850 were sent to the markets. Over the years, Golem has spent some of the ETH but retained over 98,000 ETH as a stake in the Beacon Chain contract. The recent amount of ETH moved to exchanges matches the potential reward from staking. Golem would earn up to 3,872 ETH a year, and the recent ETH sale is consistent with staking since the summer of 2023. Previously, Golem Network has explained that a part of the ETH shifts is for intended staking tests . The proceeds of staking may be used for ecosystem development, as well as marketing and project visibility. Despite this, Golem has been inactive on social media since the end of 2024. The recent shift in funds is relatively small compared to Golem‚Äôs activity during the late 2024 bull market. During a market peak, Golem moved 24,400 ETH , with another 36,000 ETH shifted to exchanges in December. Previously, Golem claimed some of the ETH may be sent to Binance or Coinbase to test other forms of delegated staking. Golem ecosystem funds other projects Similar to other large-scale ICOs like Animoca Brands, Golem has spread its influence by funding other projects. While the ICO has sold some of its ETH, it also managed to retain it for the long term, while similar projects have sold all ICO proceeds. Golem has set aside 40,000 ETH for innovation scholarships and supporting other projects. The potential of Golem is to create multiple new startups, as recent ICOs raise much smaller amounts of ETH. The platform has not turned into a formal fund and has no known backers since crypto VC funding was barely developed in 2016. Golem retains around 10K ETH in its multisig wallet and has not posted any proof of reserves or a plan for spending the funds. The team has claimed it did not intend to liquidate the entire ETH treasury, though the project ended up sitting on significant liquidity after a series of sales in 2024. The GLM native token for Golem is still tradable, though forgotten in comparison to hotter new memes. GLM traded at $0.31 after a recent recovery. Short-term traders view GLM as a potential source of easy 2X gains due to the available liquidity and listings on top exchanges. The token is valued at only $313M, easily surpassed by newer assets. GLM is also fully launched and diluted, leading to speculative trading with regular spikes and drawdowns. GLM peaked above $0.72 during the altcoin market rally in March 2024. GLM is in the DePIN category of tokens, though it has not announced any links to AI or the recent agent trend. GLM ranks in the top 20 of the DePIN category, lagging behind the hottest tokens like RNDR and TAO. Golem has built a general-purpose network for shared computational resources, with just under 20K holders of the GLM token and ecosystem participants. So far, GLM has not explored the meme potential of its asset or tried to ride any modern trends, which are mostly well-supplied by its ICO reserves. title: Story Protocol price hikes 55%, joining top AI tokens by market cap
body: Story Protocol, launched just over a week ago, joins top 10 AI projects by market cap, surpassing Virtual Protocol. Story Protocol ( IP ) is currently trading for $5.23, up 55% in the past 24 hours and 186% in the past week, with a market cap of over $1.2 billion. This makes it one of the top 10 AI projects by market cap, surpassing Virtual Protocol, according to CoinGecko . Source: Top Artificial Intelligence (AI) Coins by Market Cap The price surge comes after the platform shared more details about its technical roadmap on Thursday. According to the roadmap, the network plans to roll out the public beta for its IP Portal and decentralized oracle network in Q2. Our Technical Roadmap is Live! Story is committed to driving continuous improvements to L1 performance, reliability, and decentralization. And built on top of our L1 infrastructure is a unique stack of IP-focused product features and applications. Dive in ‚Ü¥ pic.twitter.com/Eyns5HhkQH ‚Äî Story (ÍßÅIPÍßÇ) (@StoryProtocol) February 20, 2025 It also follows a series of recent listings on major exchanges, including crypto.com , MEXC and KuCoin . You might also like: Crypto.com lists Story Protocol and AI Rig Complex, markets react differently Story protocol officially launched its public mainnet just over a week ago, following a six-month testnet phase. Alongside its mainnet launch, Story Protocol conducted its first unlock event, releasing 25% of the initial 1 billion IP tokens, with 58.4% allocated to the ecosystem and community, foundation, and initial incentives. Source: Story Foundation blog Developed by PIP Labs, Story Protocol (IP) is a Layer 1 blockchain aimed at revolutionizing intellectual property management. To this end, it offers creators the ability to register their intellectual property as ‚ÄúIP Assets‚Äù on the blockchain, allowing them to set programmable usage terms and directly monetize their content without relying on intermediaries. The platform‚Äôs native token, ‚ÄúIP,‚Äù announced on Feb. 7, is used for transaction fees and governance voting. The project had a strong presale, securing $80 million in a Series B funding round led by Andreessen Horowitz (a16z), bringing its total funding to $140 million. title: River CEO warns that Bitcoin at risk from quantum computers, sees no danger for banking stays
body: While quantum computing poses a threat to Bitcoin‚Äôs security, banks have multiple defenses in place to prevent a widespread collapse, River‚Äôs Leishman says. The debate over whether quantum computers could threaten Bitcoin ( BTC ) is heating up once again, with River CEO Alexander Leishman arguing that Bitcoin is at greater risk than traditional banking systems. https://twitter.com/Leishman/status/1892685481357255036?s=20 In an X post on Feb. 21, Leishman explained that in case with Bitcoin, the security of funds depends entirely on the private key. Once a public key is exposed, a quantum computer could access the funds with ease. ‚ÄúThere is no layer of protection here for any address with a revealed public key. It is, BY FAR, the most ROI+ attack to perform if you have access to a QC no question.‚Äù Alexander Leishman However, the banking system is more secure, Leishman agues. While a quantum computer could disrupt HTTPS encryption, which is used to secure online communication, attackers would still need to intercept traffic and hijack DNS before gaining access to bank systems. You might also like: Avalanche CEO calls for freezing Satoshi-era million Bitcoins amid quantum computing concerns Banks also use additional security layers like IP whitelists and symmetric password authentication, which are not vulnerable to quantum computers, Leishman explains. ‚ÄúEven if you do manage to pop a bank you need to get that money somewhere. Everything is very KYC‚Äôd with a lot of manual controls around large movements of funds. Good luck moving millions or billions without a human catching something.‚Äù Alexander Leishman While quantum computing poses a potential threat to Bitcoin, it‚Äôs not something to worry about in the near future. However, recent developments suggest that quantum computing may be closer than previously thought. On Feb. 19, Microsoft introduced a new quantum chip, claiming it demonstrates quantum computing is ‚Äúyears, not decades‚Äù away. The so-called Majorana 1 chip is designed to reduce quantum computing‚Äôs error-prone nature and is supported by a scientific paper slated for publication in Nature. While there‚Äôs still some doubt in the tech world about how soon quantum computing will have an impact, companies like Google and IBM are predicting large-scale quantum computers could be up and running by 2033. Read more: Tether CEO predicts quantum computing could recover lost Bitcoin

title: Bitcoin RHODL Momentum Slowing Down‚ÄîAnalyst Warns Pattern ‚ÄòNot Ideal‚Äô
body: An on-chain analyst has pointed out that the Realized HODL (RHODL) Ratio indicator is on the way down, a sign that may not be positive for Bitcoin. Bitcoin RHODL Has Been Losing Momentum Recently In a new post on X, analyst Checkmate has discussed about the latest trend in the RHODL Ratio of Bitcoin. The ‚ÄúRealized HODL (RHODL) Ratio‚Äù is an on-chain metric that calculates the ratio between any two given RHODL wave bands. HODL wave bands keep track of the percentage of the total BTC supply that was last moved inside a given age range. The RHODL wave bands are a modified form of these, adding an additional weighting factor: the Realized Value. Related Reading: Ethereum Fees Back To Lowest Since August: Is This Bullish? Put simply, the Realized Value is the spot price at which a given token of the cryptocurrency was last transacted on the blockchain. That is, it‚Äôs the coin‚Äôs current cost basis. As the RHODL wave band multiplies this metric with the amount of supply present within a given band, it tells us about the sum of cost bases of coins in that band. When the value of the indicator goes up for any particular band, it means the amount of capital invested into coins falling in the age range is rising. In the context of the current topic, the RHODL Ratio of the 1 week and 1 to 2 years bands is of relevance. Below is the chart shared by the analyst, that shows the trend in this RHODL Ratio over the history of Bitcoin. As displayed in the above graph, the Bitcoin RHODL Ratio for these wave bands shot up to a high level during the rally beyond $100,000 that took place last year. Such a trend implies the 1 week wave band, which corresponds to the fresh capital coming into the sector, grew large relative to the veteran 1 year to 2 years band. From the chart, it‚Äôs apparent that an extreme rotation of capital into the 1 week wave band has historically coincided with bull run tops for the cryptocurrency‚Äôs price. Since last year‚Äôs peak, the metric has been on the way down, which suggests the new demand for the asset is now slowing down. This is also visible in the momentum oscillator for the indicator attached by the analyst on the bottom, which just dipped into a zone that has played the role of the transition region between bullish and bearish trends in the past. Related Reading: How Close Is Bitcoin To A Bear Market? This Historical Level May Contain Hints Considering the historical pattern, this development in the RHODL Ratio is certainly not the best for Bitcoin. It now remains to be seen whether the metric would continue its decline in the coming days, potentially signaling a transition away from a bull market, or if it will bounce back up. BTC Price Bitcoin made a retest of the $98,000 mark earlier today, but it appears the coin ended up finding rejection as its price is now down to $97,000. Featured image from Dall-E, checkonchain.com, chart from TradingView.com

title: Coin Terminal and ZetaChain announce a new crypto hackathon
body: Coin Terminal, a leading Web3 platform, has partnered with ZetaChain ( ZETA ), a Layer-1 ( L1 ) blockchain, to launch a new crypto hackathon, as reported to Finbold on Friday, February 21. During the event, participants can secure up to $1 million in fundraising through Coin Terminal, as well as potential venture capital and angel investments. The event also features developer sessions conducted by industry experts, one-on-one mentorship programs, and exclusive networking opportunities. The AI3 Hackathon with ZetaChain X @CoinTerminalCom is now LIVE. $1,000,000. One Universal App. One Winner üëá https://t.co/AS7sGnwKmn pic.twitter.com/Yp9GdQcK6p ‚Äî ZetaChain (@zetablockchain) February 20, 2025 AI3 Hackathon Having started on February 20, the hackathon opened with a welcome session followed by an explanation of the event‚Äôs structure. A dedicated ZetaChain Developer Session and additional discussions followed later, diving into blockchain development and product marketing strategies. However, the second day, February 21, is deemed more crucial as the final judging round with over 35 projects already submitted. As participation is not open to all, Coin Terminal and ZetaChain have personally selected the most promising projects to ensure only the most innovative teams can take part in the event. The judging panel includes the co-founder and chief executive officer (CEO) of Blockchain.com, ZetaChain‚Äôs Head of Developer Relations, the Investment Director at MEXC, the Head of Investments at Gate.io, the Head of Research at Uphold, and key members of Coin Terminal. Industry leaders such as MEXC, Gate.io, Uphold, and Blockchain.com are also official partners of the event. AI and blockchain innovation As of February 2025, Coin Terminal has a user base of over 521,000 and has helped fund 66 startups. On the other hand, supported by over 300 ecosystem partners, ZetaChain has facilitated more than 167 million transactions across 4.1 million unique addresses. The new hackathon has allowed the two partners to attract developers, entrepreneurs, and innovators and promote groundbreaking decentralized applications (dApps) that harness the power of both artificial intelligence ( AI ) and blockchain technology . title: Pi Network‚Äôs Major Achievement, Ripple (XRP) Price Targets, and More: Bits Recap for Feb 21
body: TL;DR The PI token began trading on Bitget, MEXC, and OKX. Its price spiked to nearly $2 before collapsing to the current $0.63. Ripple (XRP) jumped to almost $2.75 following the approval of the first spot XRP ETF in Brazil, now trading around $2.66. Analysts, including Ali Martinez, predict a potential rebound. Bitcoin (BTC) climbed back above $98,000, improving market sentiment as the Fear and Greed Index re-entered the ‚ÄúGreed‚Äù zone. Fed official Raphael Bostic hints at possible 2025 rate cuts that could fuel a further price surge. The Long-Awaited Milestone Earlier this week, Pi Network finally launched its Open Network. The development saw the light of day nearly six years after the project‚Äôs birth and made the PI token publicly accessible by allowing exchanges to list it. Some of those that hopped on the bandwagon were Bitget, MEXC, and OKX. The asset‚Äôs price experienced huge volatility during its first day of trading, briefly climbing to almost $2 before crashing to the current $0.63 (per CoinGecko‚Äôs data). PI Price, Source: CoinGecko It is worth mentioning that Pi Network has been the subject of controversy numerous times, and some industry participants remain skeptical about it. Bybit‚Äôs CEO Ben Zhou , for instance, called it a scam and assured that his company will not embrace the token. ‚ÄúIf the project is legitimate and straight up, then you should come forth and address these reports so everyone can understand, but instead you choose to make up shit and do these childish attacks with no ground,‚Äù he stated. XRP Predictions Ripple‚Äôs XRP was among the top-performing cryptocurrencies yesterday (February 20), with its price jumping to almost $2.75. The rally occurred shortly after Brazil‚Äôs securities regulator ‚Äì the Comiss√£o de Valores Mobili√°rios ‚Äì approved the world‚Äôs first spot XRP exchange-traded fund (ETF). In the past several hours, though, the asset lost some steam and is currently trading at approximately $2.66. XRP Price, Source: CoinGecko However, many market observers remain optimistic that another pump could be on the horizon. The popular X user Ali Martinez assumed that XRP looks ready for a rebound ‚Äúas the TD Sequential indicator flashes a buy signal on the hourly chart.‚Äù Prior to that, though, the analyst observed the same technical indicator to warn about a potential pullback for Ripple‚Äôs native token. BTC Crawls Into Green Territory Lastly, we will touch upon the primary cryptocurrency, which has witnessed an evident price increase in the past few days. Recall that Bitcoin (BTC) slipped below $94,000 on February 18, but it is currently well above $98,000. BTC Price, Source: CoinGecko Its resurgence has seemingly affected investor sentiment, with the Fear and Greed Index entering the ‚ÄúGreed‚Äù zone again . Meanwhile, Atlanta Fed President Raphael Bostic said his ‚Äúbaseline expectation‚Äù is for two additional rate cuts later this year, but ‚Äúthe uncertainty around that is pretty significant.‚Äù Lowering the benchmark in the following months might give the crypto market a serious boost . After all, such a decision will make money-borrowing easier and could increase the interest in riskier assets such as BTC. title: Sudden Exit: Clearview AI CEO Resigns Amidst Facial Recognition Backlash
body: In a surprising turn of events in the ever-evolving world of AI and data privacy, Hoan Ton-That, the CEO of Clearview AI, has announced his resignation. This news, first broken by Forbes and confirmed by Bitcoin World, marks a significant shift for the controversial facial recognition startup that built its empire on a massive database of 30 billion scraped photos. Ton-That stated his departure is for ‚Äúthe next chapter‚Äù in his life, while assuring he will remain on the board. But what does this sudden exit mean for the future of Clearview AI, especially in the context of ongoing debates around facial recognition technology and data privacy ? Why Did the Clearview AI CEO Resign Now? While Ton-That remains tight-lipped about the specific reasons behind his resignation, the timing is certainly noteworthy. Clearview AI, under his leadership, has been a lightning rod for controversy since its inception. Here‚Äôs a quick recap of the challenges they‚Äôve faced: Massive Data Scraping: Clearview AI built its powerful facial recognition database by scraping billions of photos from the internet without user consent. This practice immediately raised alarm bells regarding privacy and ethical considerations. GDPR Fines and Legal Battles: The company has been slapped with over $100 million in GDPR fines from European data protection agencies for violating data privacy regulations. Their uncooperative stance and refusal to pay these fines have only intensified scrutiny. Lawsuits and Counterclaims: Beyond GDPR, Clearview AI has faced legal challenges on multiple fronts, including a lawsuit from Charles Johnson alleging co-founder status, which was recently dropped, though counterclaims remain. Unprofitability and Contract Struggles: Despite claims of record growth and revenue in 2024, reports suggest Clearview AI remains unprofitable and has struggled to secure large federal contracts. Could the mounting pressure from these challenges have contributed to Ton-That‚Äôs decision to step down? The lack of transparency surrounding his resignation leaves room for speculation, but the backdrop of these issues is undeniable. New Leadership and a Trump Administration Focus Stepping into the CEO role are Hal Lambert and Richard Schwartz, now co-CEOs. Their background in Republican politics signals a potential strategic shift for Clearview AI, particularly with an eye on the upcoming Trump administration. Let‚Äôs break down what we know about these new leaders: Co-CEO Background Potential Implications Hal Lambert Early Clearview AI investor; Founder of Point Bridge Capital, known for the MAGA ETF May prioritize relationships with Republican administrations and focus on government contracts. MAGA ETF history suggests a politically aligned approach. Richard Schwartz Clearview AI Co-founder; Former senior advisor to Rudy Giuliani Deep political connections within Republican circles. Giuliani link could indicate a focus on law enforcement and national security applications of facial recognition . Their statement to Bitcoin World about capitalizing on ‚Äúnew opportunities‚Äù under the Trump administration is telling. It suggests a pivot towards leveraging political connections to secure government contracts, potentially in areas where facial recognition technology is favored, such as law enforcement and national security. The Ethical Tightrope of Facial Recognition and AI Ethics Clearview AI‚Äôs journey has been a stark illustration of the ethical dilemmas surrounding facial recognition technology. While proponents argue for its effectiveness in law enforcement and security, critics raise serious concerns about privacy violations and potential for misuse. Key ethical questions remain at the forefront: Consent and Data Collection: Is it ethical to build a massive facial recognition database by scraping photos without individuals‚Äô consent? Where is the line between public data and personal privacy? Bias and Accuracy: Facial recognition systems have been shown to exhibit biases across different demographics. How can we ensure fairness and accuracy, especially in high-stakes applications like law enforcement? Surveillance and Civil Liberties: The widespread use of facial recognition raises concerns about mass surveillance and its impact on civil liberties. How do we prevent this technology from becoming a tool for unchecked government monitoring? Transparency and Accountability: Who should be accountable for the use and potential misuse of facial recognition technology? How can we ensure transparency in its deployment and prevent abuses? These are not just academic questions. They have real-world implications for individual rights and societal norms. As AI ethics continues to gain prominence, companies like Clearview AI are under increasing pressure to address these concerns. Data Privacy in the Age of AI: What‚Äôs Next for Clearview AI? Ton-That‚Äôs resignation and the new co-CEO leadership mark a potential turning point for Clearview AI. Will they pivot towards greater transparency and address the persistent data privacy concerns? Or will they double down on government contracts and navigate the regulatory landscape with their political connections? Here are a few possible scenarios: Increased Government Focus: With leaders connected to Republican politics, Clearview AI might aggressively pursue federal and state government contracts, potentially finding more favorable reception under a Trump administration. Continued Legal Battles: The GDPR fines and other legal challenges are unlikely to disappear overnight. Clearview AI will need to develop a strategy for navigating these ongoing legal battles, potentially involving negotiations or further defiance. Reputation Management: The company‚Äôs controversial image is a significant hurdle. New leadership might attempt to rebrand or improve public perception, possibly by emphasizing ethical considerations or highlighting successful use cases in law enforcement. Technological Advancements: Regardless of leadership changes, the underlying technology of facial recognition continues to evolve. Clearview AI may focus on refining its algorithms, expanding its database, or exploring new applications beyond law enforcement. The cryptocurrency and blockchain space, while seemingly distant from facial recognition , is deeply intertwined with discussions around data privacy , security, and ethical technology development. As the world becomes increasingly data-driven, the lessons learned from Clearview AI‚Äôs journey are relevant across industries. Conclusion: A New Chapter for Clearview AI and the Future of Facial Recognition Hoan Ton-That‚Äôs resignation signals a pivotal moment for Clearview AI. The company, now under new leadership with strong political ties, stands at a crossroads. Whether they can navigate the complex landscape of AI ethics , data privacy regulations, and public perception remains to be seen. The future of facial recognition technology itself hangs in the balance, with Clearview AI‚Äôs next moves likely to influence the broader conversation around its responsible and ethical deployment. The crypto community, keenly aware of privacy and decentralization, will be watching closely as this story unfolds. To learn more about the latest AI ethics and data privacy trends in the tech world, explore our articles on key developments shaping AI regulations and institutional adoption.
tags: AI News|#Startups|AI ethics|Clearview AI|data privacy|Facial Recognition

title: Litecoin (LTC) Surges 46% in Just 2 Weeks on ETF Buzz
body: Litecoin (LTC), ranked #15 on the list of largest cryptocurrencies by market cap, has been flexing its muscles lately, growing its value by 46% in slightly over two weeks. The asset, often overshadowed by flashier rivals such as Bitcoin (BTC), is riding a wave of investor optimism, registering $9.6 billion in daily on-chain transaction volumes per data from Santiment. Litecoin Gains Momentum Amid ETF Speculation While Bitcoin and Ethereum often dominate crypto headlines, LTC has been quietly building momentum. According to Santiment, between February 2 and February 19, its market cap went up by 46%, fueled by increased network utility and institutional interest. Litecoin doesn‚Äôt typically get the social media hype of other top cap cryptocurrencies like XRP, Solana, Chainlink or Cardano. But on the back of some legitimate ETF rumors, it has quietly seen a big jump in value recently. From February 2 to February 19, 2025, Litecoin‚Äôs‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/FSRpoKt2zd ‚Äî Santiment (@santimentfeed) February 20, 2025 The buzz isn‚Äôt just speculation. Recently, Bloomberg analysts James Seyffart and Eric Balchunas suggested there was a 90% chance of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) approving exchange-traded funds (ETFs) tracking Litecoin. The odds of this product hitting the market are much higher than those of larger capped cryptocurrencies, including Dogecoin (DOGE), Ripple (XRP), and Solana (SOL). Canary Capital has filed to list a Litecoin ETF, with the SEC acknowledging the filing and initiating its review process. If approved, it would allow mainstream investors to gain exposure to LTC without managing private keys or holding the asset directly. In Santiment‚Äôs view, an LTC ETF would not only open the floodgates for institutional investment but also make it more likely for the other altcoins to be tied to similar financial products. On-Chain Activity and Market Impact Beyond the ETF noises, Litecoin‚Äôs $9.6 billion worth of on-chain trading activity over the past week is remarkable. The same metric had a value of $2.8 billion just six months ago, meaning its current state is a 242% improvement from that period. Meanwhile, market watchers have predicted LTC‚Äôs next price target at $140, with a potential rally toward $170 if momentum continues. At the time of writing, the coin was changing hands at just above $133, a 3.4% improvement on its level 24 hours ago. Across 12 months, the cryptocurrency‚Äôs price is up more than 94%, pushing its market value past the $10 billion mark. Although that barely compares to Bitcoin‚Äôs nearly $2 trillion market cap, the OG crypto‚Äôs recent dip to a two-week low of $93,500 saw it outperformed by Litecoin, which also did significantly better than the broader crypto market, which is up a mere 0.60%. The post Litecoin (LTC) Surges 46% in Just 2 Weeks on ETF Buzz appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: The Memecoin Craze Continues! Another American Celebrity Is Launching His Own Memecoin! Here's That Name
body: Rapper and designer Ye, better known as Kanye West, is set to launch his own cryptocurrency token, YZY, despite his past criticism of crypto projects and ongoing controversy over his public statements. Ye Plans YZY Crypto Token Despite Previous ‚ÄòCoin‚Äô Criticism According to multiple sources familiar with the project, 70% of the YZY token supply will be allocated directly to Ye, with only 10% set aside for liquidity and 20% for investors. The token is designed as an official currency for fashion brand Yeezy and will be accepted as payment on its website. Ye‚Äôs move into cryptocurrency comes after a series of major job losses in recent years. Ye was fired by Adidas, Balenciaga, and his talent agency after making anti-Semitic remarks in 2022. Most recently, he shut down his Shopify online store after calling himself a ‚ÄúNazi‚Äù and selling a T-shirt with a swastika. With mainstream platforms cutting ties, the decentralized nature of crypto offers an alternative for Ye to monetize his brand without institutional oversight. Ye‚Äôs move into crypto comes despite his own past skepticism. Earlier this year, he dismissed crypto in a social media post, saying: ‚ÄúCash is just preying on fans with hype.‚Äù He also noted that he previously turned down a $2 million offer to launch a token. However, sources say Ye was inspired by Donald Trump‚Äôs TRUMP memecoin, which was launched just before the former president‚Äôs second term in office and saw significant insider ownership. title: Exciting Milestone: Canary Litecoin ETF Listed on DTCC ‚Äì Is SEC Approval Next?
body: Get ready for a potentially groundbreaking development in the world of cryptocurrency investments! The buzz is building as reports emerge about the Canary Litecoin ETF getting listed on the Depository Trust & Clearing Corporation (DTCC) website. This exciting news, initially highlighted by the crypto insights platform Unfolded on X, suggests a significant step forward for this much-anticipated financial product. But what does this listing really mean for Litecoin and the broader crypto market? Let‚Äôs dive into the details and explore what this could signal for the future of cryptocurrency ETFs. Decoding the DTCC Listing: A Crucial Step for Canary Litecoin ETF First things first, what exactly is the DTCC, and why is a listing here noteworthy? The Depository Trust & Clearing Corporation (DTCC) is a vital part of the financial infrastructure in the United States. It provides clearing and settlement services for trillions of dollars in securities transactions annually, essentially acting as the plumbing that keeps the financial markets flowing smoothly. Listing on the DTCC website is generally understood as a preparatory step for an ETF to begin trading on exchanges once regulatory approvals are in place. It signifies that the infrastructure is being set up for the ETF to function in the market. For the Canary Litecoin ETF , this listing on the DTCC is not just a procedural update; it‚Äôs a tangible sign of progress in its journey towards becoming a publicly traded investment vehicle. Think of it like this: DTCC Listing: Setting up the operational framework ‚Äì think of it as preparing the stage for a play. SEC Approval: The green light from regulators ‚Äì this is the official go-ahead for the play to begin. Exchange Listing: Where the action happens ‚Äì this is where investors can actually buy and sell shares of the ETF, like the play being performed in a theater. While DTCC listing is a positive indicator, it‚Äôs essential to remember that it is not the final hurdle. The crucial step remains the approval from the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). The SEC‚Äôs Role: Navigating the Path to Litecoin ETF Approval The journey of any ETF, especially a cryptocurrency ETF, involves rigorous scrutiny by the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). In the case of the Canary Litecoin ETF , Canary Funds officially submitted their 19b-4 application to the SEC on January 16th. This application is a formal request seeking permission to list and trade the proposed Litecoin ETF on an exchange. The 19b-4 form is a crucial document in the ETF approval process, detailing the structure, operation, and rationale behind the proposed ETF. It kicks off a formal review period where the SEC evaluates whether the ETF meets the necessary regulatory standards to protect investors and maintain market integrity. The SEC‚Äôs review process is thorough and can be lengthy. They consider various factors, including: Market Surveillance: Ensuring there are mechanisms in place to prevent market manipulation and fraud in the underlying Litecoin market. Custody Solutions: Evaluating the security and reliability of how the Litecoin assets backing the ETF will be stored and managed. Investor Protection: Assessing whether the ETF structure is transparent and provides adequate disclosures to investors about the risks involved. While the DTCC listing is a promising sign, the SEC‚Äôs decision will ultimately determine whether the Litecoin ETF sees the light of day in the US market. The cryptocurrency community is keenly watching this process, hoping for a favorable outcome that could pave the way for broader acceptance of crypto investment products. Why a Litecoin ETF Matters: Unpacking the Potential Benefits The potential launch of a Litecoin ETF is significant for several reasons. Firstly, it represents a further expansion of cryptocurrency investment options available to mainstream investors. ETFs, or Exchange Traded Funds, are popular investment vehicles known for their accessibility, diversification, and ease of trading. A Litecoin ETF would allow investors to gain exposure to Litecoin without directly holding the cryptocurrency itself. This can be particularly appealing to those who are interested in the crypto market but are hesitant about the complexities of wallets, private keys, and exchanges. Here are some potential benefits of a Litecoin ETF: Accessibility: Investing in a Litecoin ETF would be as simple as buying shares of any stock through a traditional brokerage account. Regulation and Security: ETFs operate within a regulated framework, potentially offering a sense of security and oversight that some investors find reassuring compared to the often-unregulated crypto exchange landscape. Diversification: For investors looking to diversify their portfolios, a Litecoin ETF could provide exposure to a different segment of the cryptocurrency market beyond Bitcoin and Ethereum. Tax Efficiency (Potentially): Depending on the jurisdiction and individual circumstances, ETFs can sometimes offer tax advantages compared to directly holding the underlying asset. The introduction of a Litecoin ETF could unlock a significant influx of capital into the Litecoin market, potentially driving up demand and price. It could also legitimize Litecoin further in the eyes of institutional investors and traditional financial markets. Navigating the Challenges: Hurdles and Considerations for Litecoin ETFs While the prospect of a Canary Litecoin ETF is exciting, it‚Äôs important to acknowledge the challenges and hurdles that cryptocurrency ETFs, in general, face. The SEC has been cautious in approving crypto spot ETFs, primarily due to concerns about market manipulation and investor protection. While Bitcoin spot ETFs have recently been approved, the regulatory landscape for other cryptocurrencies remains uncertain. The SEC will likely apply similar scrutiny to Litecoin ETFs, focusing on the maturity and robustness of the Litecoin market. Some potential challenges include: Regulatory Uncertainty: The SEC‚Äôs stance on cryptocurrency ETFs can evolve, and there‚Äôs no guarantee that a Litecoin ETF will receive approval, even with the DTCC listing. Market Volatility: Cryptocurrency markets are known for their volatility. The SEC will want to ensure that the ETF structure can withstand these fluctuations and protect investors. Custodial Risks: Securely storing large amounts of Litecoin for an ETF is a significant undertaking. The SEC will scrutinize the custodial solutions proposed by Canary Funds. Competition: The crypto ETF space is becoming increasingly competitive. The success of a Litecoin ETF will depend on its ability to attract investors in a crowded market. Despite these challenges, the DTCC listing of the Canary Litecoin ETF is a positive signal. It suggests that progress is being made and that the infrastructure is being prepared for a potential launch. The cryptocurrency community will be eagerly awaiting further updates from the SEC regarding the 19b-4 application. Actionable Insights: What Should Investors Watch For? For those interested in the potential of a Litecoin ETF , staying informed is key. Here are some actionable insights to consider: Monitor SEC Announcements: Keep an eye on official announcements from the SEC regarding the review of the Canary Litecoin ETF 19b-4 application. Any updates or decisions will be significant market events. Track DTCC Updates: Continue to monitor the DTCC website for any further updates related to the Canary Litecoin ETF listing. Changes in status or additional listings could provide further clues. Follow Crypto News Platforms: Stay updated with reputable cryptocurrency news platforms like Unfolded and others for timely analysis and insights on ETF developments. Understand ETF Risks: Before investing in any ETF, especially a cryptocurrency ETF, ensure you understand the associated risks, including market volatility and regulatory uncertainty. Conclusion: A Promising Step for Litecoin and Crypto ETFs The listing of the Canary Litecoin ETF on the DTCC website is undoubtedly a significant and encouraging development. It represents a tangible step forward in the journey towards bringing a Litecoin ETF to the US market. While SEC approval is still pending and challenges remain, this news injects a dose of optimism into the cryptocurrency space. For Litecoin, it could mean increased institutional interest and broader investor adoption. For the crypto ETF market, it signals continued expansion and diversification beyond Bitcoin. As we await further developments, the DTCC listing serves as a powerful reminder of the ongoing evolution and maturation of the cryptocurrency investment landscape. The future of cryptocurrency investment options looks increasingly bright, and the Canary Litecoin ETF is poised to potentially play a key role in shaping that future. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action.

title: Bybit CEO Ben Zhou slams Pi network as scam, cites Chinese authorities‚Äô warning
body: Ben Zhou, the CEO of Bybit, and the controversial blockchain project Pi Network have reignited their feud. On X, Zhou posted that Bybit will not be supporting Pi Network, citing fraud as his reason. He also shared an official police warning of $Pi from Chinese police dated back in 2023. Pi Network‚Äôs mainnet launch overshadowed by Bybit CEO‚Äôs harsh criticism On Thursday morning, the Pi coin was officially listed on several exchanges, including OKX, Gate.io, Bitget, and more. Amid the otherwise successful launch of the Pi Network mainnet, pioneers received dampening news from Bybit CEO Ben Zhou. The network‚Äôs mainnet initially experienced several delays and rescheduling. While fans of the Pi network celebrated the successful listing of the Pi coin on several exchanges, the exuberance was short-lived as Bybit CEO Ben criticized the project and its cryptocurrency. The police warning article said older people had been deceived into mining Pi coin with the prospect of rewards, like cars and luxury gifts, but hadn‚Äôt delivered anything. Some victims provided real identification details to cash their winnings but didn‚Äôt get anything in return. Zhou noted that the Pi Network had devastating effects on its victims, some of whom lost pension funds and personal data because of the project. His comments were prompted by an anonymous post on X claiming that Bybit‚Äôs decision not to list Pi coin stemmed from personal bias, claiming that Pi Network developers had rejected the exchange. ‚ÄúBybit had made no listing request to $PI, and the claim that $PI was refused by Bybit or failed its KYB is complete nonsense,‚Äù Zhou wrote. He further challenged the Pi Network to address these concerns transparently instead of making ‚Äúchildish attacks.‚Äù Pi Network‚Äôs soaring debut fizzles as scam allegations and price crash cloud optimism The Pi Network continues to face allegations of being a scam despite its price reaching an all-time high of about $330 million after launching its long-awaited mainnet on February 20. When launched, the token‚Äôs price soared to $1.99 ‚Äî a remarkable 36% jump. However, enthusiasm soon faded, and the token‚Äôs value crashed by 55% in the following hours, falling to a low of $0.9123. The comments by Zhou have stirred up a mixed bag of reactions within the crypto community. An anonymous user on X wasn‚Äôt very pleased with the Pi Network team after accidentally sending some tokens to the wrong wallet address. The user said they had attempted to contact support many times with no response and that the project has no customer support or operational integrity. Others have lauded Zhou‚Äôs move to oppose Pi Network. Others praised Bybit for its extensive due diligence process and for refusing to list a token that raised a litany of red flags. A comment by one user highlighted that crypto exchanges should be more scrutinizing when allowing projects on their platform and have a job to protect investors from major scams. title: Bold Move: Altvest Capital Pioneers Bitcoin Treasury Reserve Strategy in Africa
body: In a potentially groundbreaking move for African markets and cryptocurrency adoption, South African-listed Altvest Capital has announced its strategic embrace of Bitcoin (BTC). This bold decision positions Altvest Capital to become the first publicly traded company in Africa to officially adopt Bitcoin as a primary treasury reserve asset. Let‚Äôs dive into what this means, why it‚Äôs significant, and what the future might hold. Why Bitcoin Treasury Reserve is a Strategic Game Changer? Altvest Capital‚Äôs CEO, Warren Wheatley, recently revealed to Bloomberg the company‚Äôs purchase of 1 BTC and ambitious plans to significantly increase their Bitcoin holdings. They are currently seeking regulatory nods to raise a substantial $10 million through a stock sale, specifically earmarked for expanding their Bitcoin treasury reserve . But why Bitcoin? What makes it such an appealing asset for a company‚Äôs treasury? Hedge Against Economic Uncertainty: Wheatley explicitly stated that Bitcoin is viewed as a strategic reserve asset, acting as a powerful hedge against economic instability. This is particularly relevant in regions experiencing currency depreciation, like South Africa with its Rand. Diversification Beyond Traditional Assets: Companies traditionally hold reserves in fiat currencies or precious metals. Adding Bitcoin provides diversification into a completely new asset class, uncorrelated with traditional markets. Potential for Appreciation: Bitcoin‚Äôs history, while volatile, has shown significant long-term appreciation. Companies adopting it as a reserve asset are betting on its continued growth potential. Decentralization and Transparency: Bitcoin operates outside traditional financial systems, offering decentralization and transparency through its blockchain technology. Altvest Capital‚Äôs Crypto Adoption Africa: A Pioneer in the Making Altvest Capital‚Äôs move isn‚Äôt just about Bitcoin; it‚Äôs a significant step for crypto adoption in Africa . Africa, with its burgeoning tech-savvy population and often volatile economic landscapes, presents a fertile ground for cryptocurrency adoption. Here‚Äôs why Altvest‚Äôs decision could be a catalyst: Setting a Precedent: As the first publicly listed African company to embrace Bitcoin as a treasury reserve, Altvest Capital sets a powerful precedent. This could encourage other companies in Africa and emerging markets to explore similar strategies. Boosting Investor Confidence: Such a move from a publicly traded entity can enhance investor confidence in the crypto space within Africa. It signals maturity and acceptance at a corporate level. Driving Innovation in Financial Strategies: Altvest‚Äôs approach can inspire innovation in financial strategies across the continent, prompting businesses to consider digital assets for treasury management and growth. Consider the broader context: While companies like MicroStrategy and Tesla have famously adopted Bitcoin treasury strategies in North America, Altvest Capital is potentially blazing a trail in Africa. This localized adoption is crucial for the global expansion and mainstream acceptance of cryptocurrencies. Diving Deeper into Altvest Capital Bitcoin Investment Altvest Capital Bitcoin investment is more than just a headline; it‚Äôs a calculated financial manoeuvre. Let‚Äôs break down some key aspects: Aspect Details Initial Purchase 1 BTC already acquired Fundraising Goal $10 million via stock sale Purpose of Funds Expand Bitcoin treasury reserve holdings Strategic Rationale Hedge against Rand depreciation and economic uncertainty Regulatory Status Seeking regulatory approval for stock sale The planned $10 million stock sale highlights Altvest‚Äôs serious commitment to this strategy. It‚Äôs not a token gesture, but a substantial allocation of capital towards building a significant Bitcoin reserve. This move suggests a long-term vision and confidence in Bitcoin‚Äôs potential. Bitcoin as Reserve Asset: Benefits and Challenges The concept of Bitcoin as a reserve asset is still relatively new for corporate treasuries. While the potential benefits are compelling, there are also challenges to consider: Benefits: Inflation Hedge: Bitcoin‚Äôs limited supply (21 million coins) makes it a potential hedge against inflation, unlike fiat currencies which can be inflated. Global Accessibility: Bitcoin is a global, borderless asset, easily transferable and accessible worldwide. Potential for Higher Returns: Compared to traditional low-yield reserve assets, Bitcoin offers the potential for significantly higher returns over time. Challenges: Volatility: Bitcoin is known for its price volatility, which can be a concern for corporate treasuries focused on stability. Regulatory Uncertainty: The regulatory landscape for cryptocurrencies is still evolving globally, creating uncertainty and potential risks. Accounting and Tax Complexity: Accounting for and taxing Bitcoin holdings can be complex and varies across jurisdictions. Security Risks: Storing and securing large amounts of Bitcoin requires robust security measures to prevent theft or loss. Despite these challenges, the potential rewards and strategic advantages are clearly compelling enough for companies like Altvest Capital to take the plunge. Effective risk management and a long-term perspective are crucial for navigating the complexities. South Africa Bitcoin Landscape and Future Outlook Altvest Capital‚Äôs decision also shines a spotlight on the South African Bitcoin landscape. South Africa has shown a growing interest in cryptocurrencies, both from retail investors and, now, potentially from corporate entities. This move could signal a broader trend within the South African business environment. Looking ahead, several factors will influence the success and impact of Altvest‚Äôs Bitcoin treasury strategy: Regulatory Approvals: Securing regulatory approval for the stock sale and Bitcoin holdings will be crucial for Altvest‚Äôs plans to proceed smoothly. Market Performance of Bitcoin: Bitcoin‚Äôs price performance will directly impact the value of Altvest‚Äôs reserve asset and the overall success of this strategy. Broader Market Adoption: Whether other African companies follow suit will determine if this becomes a widespread trend or remains an isolated case. Economic Conditions in South Africa: The economic climate in South Africa, particularly the performance of the Rand, will influence the effectiveness of Bitcoin as a hedge. Altvest Capital‚Äôs pioneering initiative is undoubtedly a significant development. It represents a forward-thinking approach to treasury management and a powerful endorsement of Bitcoin‚Äôs potential as a strategic corporate asset, especially in emerging markets like Africa. In conclusion, Altvest Capital‚Äôs foray into Bitcoin treasury reserves is more than just news; it‚Äôs a potential paradigm shift. It showcases the evolving role of cryptocurrencies in corporate finance and signals a growing confidence in Bitcoin as a viable and strategic asset for businesses in Africa and beyond. Keep an eye on Altvest Capital ‚Äì they might just be leading the charge in a new era of corporate treasury management. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin institutional adoption.

title: Can Bitcoin Solve the US Debt Crisis? VanEck‚Äôs Tool Provides Insights
body: The post Can Bitcoin Solve the US Debt Crisis? VanEck‚Äôs Tool Provides Insights appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News The tool, provided on the VanEck website , allows users to calculate whether BTC could help resolve the US debt crisis. The two prime components of the tool are the US National Debt Value calculator and the Bitcoin Treasury Reserve Value calculator. Currently, the US debt stands at $36 Trillion. The US National Debt Value calculator shows that if the debt grows at a compound annual growth rate of 5%, it will reach $116 Trillion by 2049. As of now, the price of Bitcoin stands at $98,269. The US Treasury Reserve Value calculator shows that if the BTC price surges by a compound annual growth rate of 25%, the value of a 1M BTC reserve will become approximately $21 Trillion by 2049 ‚Äì which is roughly 18% of the expected 2049 US Debt. The overall calculation suggests that if the US establishes a BTC strategic reserve as directed by the BITCOIN Act, it would be able to offset over 18% of its total national debt by 2049. The BITCOIN Act and Its Proposal: What You Should Know The BITCOIN Act was presented to the US Senate by Senator cynthia lummis cynthia lummis Cynthia Lummis is a senator from Wyoming, United States. She has a net worth ranging from $20 million and $75 million. On her son-in-law's advice, she purchased Bitcoin and became the first U.S senator to possess cryptocurrency. She possesses no less than $230,000 worth of Bitcoin. She adopted office on January 3, 2021, the term terminates on January 3, 2027. She has always been focused on advocating for Wyoming's future. She struggled her entire career fighting for Wyoming families, communities, businesses, and values. Beginning at the halls of the Wyoming House to the Halls of the U.S. House. Lummis was born on September 10, 1954, and graduated from the University of Wyoming, earning a bachelor's degree in animal science, and biology. She also achieved a Juris Doctor from the University of Wyoming College of Law. Her career experience comprises working as general counsel to previous Wyoming Governor Jim Geringer, Wyoming House of Representatives, as a treasure of Wyoming, and in the United States House of Representatives from Wyoming's at-large congressional district.¬†In 1990, she also worked as the chair of Mary Mead's gubernatorial campaign and Ray Hunkins's gubernatorial campaign, in 2006, also served on Bob Dole's presidential steering committee in Wyoming. Through her firmly beneficial crypto position, she developed the reception and fair guidelines of computerized resources in the United States. She voluntarily organized a great foundation for herself as a significant Bitcoin financial backer. She is professed to continue encouraging the developing cryptocurrencies industry in the United States and all over the world in 2022. Her urge for transparency on cryptographic forms of money and stable coins in U.S. regulation will maintain on becoming tremendous.¬†She had been always looking for a store of value, and she believes bitcoin specifically is a great store of value and knew that scarcity will protect its value going into the future, unlike the U.S. dollar that they are printing more of every single day. Investor The act proposes to establish a strategic Bitcoin reserve to serve as an additional store of value to bolster America‚Äôs balance sheet and ensure the transparent management of Bitcoin holdings of the federal government. While presenting the bill, Lummis said: ‚ÄúBitcoin is transforming not only our country but the world, and becoming the first developed nation to use Bitcoin as a savings technology secures our position as a global leader in financial innovation.
